Name: installed
column6: true if this version of this extension is currently installed

Name: superuser
column6: true if only superusers are allowed to install this extension

Name: relocatable
column6: true if extension can be relocated to another schema

Name: schema
column6: name of the schema that the extension must be installed into, or null if partially or fully relocatable

Name: requires
column6: names of prerequisite extensions, or null if none

Name: comment
column6: comment string from the extension's control file
